text: aliens even many scientists agree they
must be out there and what will they be
will they be the familiar friendly
little green men or giant parasitic
predators with big teeth who can suck
out our brains like over ripe mango
indeed if we were to be visited by
beings from another world would we even
recognize them as living creatures at
all flying saucer lands outside the
White House and lots of people rush up
and what sticks out we expect something
the we can actually recognize
particularly little green men is it
going to be twenty seven foot high with
nostrils out the back probably not you
want nostrils in the front
you want a head at one end you want to
follow the rules of biology and the
rules of biology say that intelligent
creatures are mid-sized creatures so if
aliens play by the rules of biology does
this mean they might look much like us
thirty years ago maybe even fifteen
years ago a majority of biologists would
not have been surprised to see little
green men but now we know that even if
you ran life on earth again we wouldn't
get people just as the second time it
rains the pattern of raindrops on the
pavement is different so the second time
we run evolution different things will
happen according to this theory the
beings alleged to have been recovered in
the 1947 Roswell incident almost
certainly could not have existed
why I don't believe that the Roswell
system was an alien is that it was human
it had a ribcage it was a primate no
question and the only place where that
will happen is here therefore it's a
cheat obviously this is bad news for
science fiction writers especially the
liberal ones who have all the different
species living together in perfect
harmony
Spock is a mad concept Vulcans who are
humanoid mating with human beings a
totally different evolutionary tree I
don't know how you feel about mating
with a frog or a bacterium which are
much closer to you that a Vulcan would
be there are might alien beings
reproduce would it be as much fun for
them as it is for us we have on earth a
very wide array of different ways of
doing it
nearly all the creatures who give up sex
if they don't die out we invent it it's
a good trick and I would be surprised
not to find it on another planet unless
the creatures are perhaps just a
thousand years ahead of us never mind
are a million years by that time they
